CountyUpdates.title: County Services Update
CountyUpdates.desc: Latest updates from Santa Barbara County
CountyUpdates.promptContent: Recent updates and announcements from Santa Barbara County services and departments.

CountyUpdates.title: Legal Resources Available
CountyUpdates.promptContent: Current information about legal resources and services available at the Santa Barbara County Law Library.

CountyUpdates.title: Public Defender News
CountyUpdates.promptContent: Latest updates and information from the Santa Barbara County Public Defender's Office.

CodeMaster.title: Code Interpreter
CodeMaster.promptContent: Explain the following code I provided, tell me what is it doing, and give me some cases if necessary.

CodeMaster.title: Bug Finder
CodeMaster.promptContent: Compile the following code I provided, tell me where is it wrong and how to fix it with clarity, precise and detailed words, eventually give me some cases if necessary.

CodeMaster.title: Localizer
CodeMaster.promptContent: I will give you a JSON file structure and the corresponding data content, I will use it as the localization of my web application, help me translate it into Japanese and keep it accurate and simple.

Interviewer.title: Japanese IT Interviewer
Interviewer.desc: Training Japanese for an IT interview
Interviewer.promptContent: As you are a japanese recruiter and there have a position of frontend engineer that need a candidate who have skills in ts, js, vue ecosystem and more about frontend fields, please interview me using japanese and ask me professional questions continually until I say done, at same time you need to fix it and give me some examples if any fault in text.
